title: Is riot gonna ban or suspend me for this??? I am freaking out.
body: I was playin a match and everything was going fine. No lag. No afk players. No dc's. Then at around 19 minutes my game just disconnected. I'm trying to get back in and reconnect, but it keeps saying I can't connect to the server again. Is anything gonna happen to my account? Because I remember my power went out once, and I got the lower rank queue 5-minute-wait-time punishment. I'm still trying to get back and it won't let me!

replies.body:
Nope, you won't get permabanned for this disconnection, but a trend of disconnections after this could land you in a lengthier low-priority queue.

If you experience this again, please let me know so we can troubleshoot the cause.
